name: foehn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a warm, dry wind that blows from the south of a mountain range, especially the Alps: The foehn can be a problem in ski resorts. The foehn wind brings Mediterranean warmth down from the Gotthard in spring.
More examplesFewer examples The Jura had no real snow below 1100m due to the foehn.The buses get extremely hot when the foehn wind blows in from Laos.Bauen enjoys an unexpectedly mild climate thanks to its openness to the Foehn wind.
